scripts.prebuildLayer: cd lambdaLayerStack && npm i && cd .. && npm run moveLibsToLayer
scripts.deploy: npm run buildLayer && npm run package
scripts.postdeploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name khelApp-stack-local --s3-bucket khelapp --parameter-overrides stageName=local --profile nevinedwin
scripts.package: sam package --template-file ./root-template.yaml --s3-bucket khelapp --output-template-file packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --profile nevinedwin
scripts.delete: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name khelApp-stack-local --region ap-south-1 --profile nevinedwin
